title: Sales Data Analysis Dashboard
description: Built an interactive Power BI dashboard analyzing 50K+ sales records. Identified key trends resulting in 15% revenue increase through data-driven insights and predictive modeling.

title: SQL Reporting Automation
description: Automated daily SQL reports reducing manual work by 80%. Implemented stored procedures and triggers for real-time business intelligence across 15+ departments.

title: Customer Churn Prediction
description: Developed ML model using Python (scikit-learn) to predict customer churn with 87% accuracy. Analyzed 100K+ customer records and identified key retention factors.

title: Financial Analysis Dashboard
description: Created comprehensive Excel dashboard with VBA macros for financial KPI tracking. Streamlined monthly reporting process saving 10+ hours per month.

title: E-commerce Analytics Platform
description: Built end-to-end analytics solution using Python and Tableau. Processed 1M+ transactions, created interactive dashboards for inventory and sales optimization.

title: Data Pipeline Automation
description: Designed automated ETL pipeline using Python and SQL Server. Reduced data processing time by 60% handling 500GB+ daily data with error handling and logging.

title: HR Analytics Dashboard
description: Developed Power BI dashboard analyzing employee performance, turnover rates, and recruitment metrics. Enabled data-driven HR decisions reducing turnover by 22%.

title: Healthcare Data Analysis
description: Analyzed 200K+ patient records using Python and SQL to identify treatment patterns. Created predictive models for patient readmission with 82% accuracy.

title: Retail Inventory Optimization
description: Built inventory forecasting model using Python and Excel. Optimized stock levels reducing waste by 30% and improving product availability by 25%.

title: Web Scraping & Data Mining
description: Automated data collection from 50+ websites using Python (BeautifulSoup, Selenium). Processed and analyzed 500K+ data points for market research.

title: Stock Market Analysis Tool
description: Created Python application analyzing stock market trends using historical data. Implemented technical indicators and visualization dashboards for investment insights.

title: Social Media Analytics
description: Built comprehensive social media analytics platform using Python and Power BI. Tracked engagement metrics, sentiment analysis, and campaign performance across platforms.

title: Time Series Forecasting
description: Developed ARIMA and Prophet models for sales forecasting with 91% accuracy. Implemented automated weekly forecasts saving 15+ hours of manual analysis.

title: Marketing Campaign Analysis
description: Analyzed multi-channel marketing campaigns using SQL and Power BI. Identified top-performing channels increasing ROI by 35% through data-driven optimization.
